title: How to Make Job Interviews More Accessible
body_paragraphs: How can you make your job interviews fairer and more inclusive for disabled people and people with different learning styles? In this article, the author shares insights from two experts on how to set up an environment where all candidates have opportunities to demonstrate their strengths.
Designing an accessible, inclusive interview process for disabled people and people with different learning styles both widens the talent pool and creates a more equitable workplace.
